meta.title: LAB SEVEN Specifications | Labrador Field Systems
meta.description: Complete technical specifications for LAB SEVEN battery system. 60A output, 7.5kWh capacity, 1-hour fast charging.

hero.title: Technical Specifications
hero.tagline: Professional-grade power in a portable package

specs.label: 60A Bates Connector
specs.description: True 60A output on professional Bates connector. No adapters, no workarounds.

specs.label: 20A Edison Outlets
specs.description: Each on its own circuit, no shared neutral. Run three 1800W devices simultaneously.

specs.label: Continuous Power
specs.description: Sustained 10kW output for hours. No derating, no thermal limits on set.

specs.label: Peak Power
specs.description: Handles startup surges from HMIs, motors, and compressors without tripping.

specs.label: Capacity
specs.description: LiFePO4 (LFP) chemistry. Safer, longer-lasting, more stable than NMC.

specs.label: Cell Configuration
specs.description: Professional battery architecture. 3000+ cycle lifespan at 80% DOD.

specs.label: Battery Management
specs.description: Real-time monitoring, cell balancing, over-current protection, thermal management.

specs.label: Runtime
specs.description: Depends on load. 8hrs at 1kW average, 45min at full 10kW continuous draw.

specs.label: Fast Charging (60A Input)
specs.description: Use 60A Bates input to charge in 1 hour. Perfect for rotating batteries on multi-day shoots.

specs.label: Standard Charging (110V)
specs.description: Plug into any 15/20A outlet. Charge overnight between shoot days.

specs.label: Input Power
specs.description: Accepts 110V (15/20A) or 240V (30A) input. Automatically adjusts charging rate.

specs.label: Dimensions
specs.description: Fits through standard doorways. Similar footprint to a road case.

specs.label: Weight
specs.description: Heavy but manageable. Roll it, don't lift it. Load levelers on all four corners.

specs.label: Construction
specs.description: Built for the road. Impact-resistant corners, weather-sealed electronics bay.

specs.label: Wheels
specs.description: 8-inch pneumatic tires. Smooth rolling on concrete, asphalt, or uneven ground.

specs.label: Chemistry
specs.description: Most stable lithium chemistry. No thermal runaway risk. Safer than NMC/NCA batteries.

specs.label: Circuit Protection
specs.description: Individual breakers on all outputs. BMS protects battery, breakers protect your gear.

specs.label: Certifications
specs.description: Meeting UL 2743 (portable power stations) and UL 2271 (battery packs) requirements.

specs.label: Insurance
specs.description: LFP chemistry accepted by most production insurance. Check with your provider.

specs.label: Display
specs.description: Real-time voltage, current, power, SOC%, temperature, runtime estimate.

specs.label: Remote Monitoring
specs.description: Monitor from your phone. Track multiple units. Get alerts for low battery or faults.

specs.label: Data Logging
specs.description: Review past usage. Export logs for reports. Prove runtime to clients.

specs.label: Operating Temperature
specs.description: Works in cold and heat. BMS adjusts charging rate based on temperature.

specs.label: Storage Temperature
specs.description: Leave it in the truck. Store it in the warehouse. It's fine.

specs.label: Humidity
specs.description: Electronics bay is weather-sealed. Can handle rain and humidity.

specs.label: Altitude
specs.description: No derating at altitude. Works the same in Denver as in Los Angeles.
